I specialize in

Instructional Design

I have a passion for the story learner’s journey—seeing someone go from uncertain at Point A to strong and competent at Point B. I really enjoy analyzing what challenges them and designing the tools they need to help them overcome and complete their journey.

Project Management

As project lead on multiple accounts, I’m in charge of managing timelines and resources for my team members to make sure we meet our deadlines and create high-quality products.

eLearning Development

At my core, I’m an artist: I love to create beautiful things. Whether it’s using the latest and greatest technologies to build eLearning courses, creating engaging experiences for Instructor-Led Trainings, or putting together a fun, instructional video, I love building the deliverables because, for me, it’s a creative outlet.

My Creative Process

While the sequence and application may vary depending on the needs of the project, I always use the following steps as guidelines to stay organized

Define

Here I research the business need, the scope of the project, the learners, potential learning gaps, and decide how to evaluate the course.

Design

Here, I determine the strategy I’ll use to address the learning gaps and put together prototypes and mockups of the deliverables.

DEVELOP

This is where I do the scripting and storyboarding work as well as build out the deliverables.
